main event: An observation of a spherical object with large brown flames at the end was reported on January 28, 1959.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 10 minutes,The sighting included large brown flames at the end with no sound,The object appeared to be at 38 degrees above the horizon and disappeared in the southeast,The initial conclusions after the sighting speculated it could be a balloon, aircraft, astronomical object, or meteoroid,The report was part of Project Blue Book, an official US Air Force investigation of unidentified flying objects.
sighted object: a spherical object with large brown flames at the end
witness description: The observer glanced out of a window and saw the object.
